dc_title_s: Map of the Western States : engraved to accompany Appleton's traveller's guide.
dc_description_s: Longitude given on top of map is from Greenwich; given on bottom of map is from Washington.   Removed from: Williams, Wellington. Appleton's southern and western travellers' guide. New York: D. Appleton & Co., 1850.|31 x 43 centimeters|Scale [1:3,168,000]|General Map Collection
